game.name: American Football Kicks
game.description:
One of the best sports to play for boys, Amercian Football Kicks are an excellent treat especially to rugby game lovers. Your primary objective in this highly challenging football game is to stay concentrated while collecting as many points as you can for your team. The more goals you make, the better score you will be able to hit on the scoreboard. The amazing graphics and easy-to-use control are enough to make it as one of the most preferred game choices among people from different age groups.

You can start this latest flash game by just pressing the spacebar to select the point where you want to kick your ball. In order to collect the top score, all you need to do is center the green area. Known as the relaxing, visual and timing-based skill game, Amercian Football Kicks is meant for teens, kids & grownups. With properly timing your kicks to shoot through the centre of the goal, you will have to use different increasingly-difficult angles on the field to make sure that you will earn the maximum possible points.Â 

Steady your muscles, roll up your sleeves and focus mainly on how to kick your ball with the right precision and accuracy in this cool rugby game. Give your best and try to earn the highest possible score in all 5 stages of this awesome mobile-friendly sports game. You will be given 5 balls in each stage to kick through which you can enjoy American Football Kicks. Skills required to play this free online sports game include excellent timing, good visual and hand-eye coordination skills, patience, sharp reactions, as well as a cool head and determination. Do not forget to share your highest score with your friends! Good luck and have fun!
